title: Create a read session
description: Creates a read session to read data from a BigQuery table using the BigQuery Storage API. A read session is required before you can start reading data streams.

objective.narrative: The `create_read_session` method is the entry point for the BigQuery Storage Read API. Developers need to create a session before they can parallelize reads across multiple streams. This sample demonstrates the initial setup required for a high-throughput data read operation from BigQuery.

regionTags.name: bigquerystorage_v1beta1_bigquerystorage_readsession_create
regionTags.title: Create a read session
regionTags.description: Creates a read session to read data from a BigQuery table using the BigQuery Storage API. A read session is required before you can start reading data streams.
